Metadata.title: Reyes Rondón Web Developer | React, Next.Js, NodeJs, TypeScript
Metadata.description: I am Reyes Rondón, Software Engineer with more than 5 years of experience developing and maintaining websites with React, PHP and WordPress.
Metadata.description_og: I am Reyes Rondón, Software Engineer with more than 5 years of experience developing and maintaining websites with React, PHP and WordPress.

Intro.text: from Barquisimeto, Venezuela. Specialized in the development and maintenance of web pages with

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.text_1: Developed 4 websites with React and Material UI. Implementing CI/CD for time reduction in the delivery of these products. Lead the performance improvement of these websites by decreasing their load times by up to 40%.
Experience.text_2: Adapted and built plugins to extend and add functionality to plugins such as WooCommerce, file management services such as Nextcloud and page editors such as Elementor and Elementor Pro implementing CI/CD and methodologies such as  SCRUM as well as the following technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MySQL and PHP.
Experience.text3: I created and maintained custom websites, always prioritizing SEO optimization, functionality and user experience. I developed tailored solutions using custom themes and plugins, and worked with programming languages such as PHP and JavaScript. In addition, I used various page builders, including Elementor, Elementor Pro and Gutenberg. To date, I have completed 5 web projects, including their ongoing maintenance.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.shortner_text: Quick and easy link shortening application with tracking of the number of times the shortened link is used.
Projects.dev_freebies_text: Dev Freebies is a curated collection of free resources designed to enhance and streamline the development process.
Projects.movie_finder_text: Application to view information about movies and series from all over the world using the amazing API of The Movie Database (TMDB).
Projects.img_detector_text: Application to easily extract a variety of colors from any image in PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WEBP and GIF format.

About.text_4: Most recently, I worked at Wordpress Hilfe & Support Berlin, where I created 15 websites from scratch and supported more than 20 with WordPress.
